column1: Smoque BBQ////Eating in is sort of a pain
column2: the dining room is tiny.  And takeout is rough because its in a totally weird location
column3: so your food is cold when you get home.  And like all good bbq
column4: it ain't cheap.  Its great food though
column6: I think bbq is a food that should be eaten elbow-to-elbow with your fellow diners!
